title: The 20-Minute Gardener: The Garden of Your Dreams Without Giving up Your Life, Your Job, or Your Sanity
description: For those with only 20 minutes a day to spare, this hands-on, uproariously funny, user-friendly guide puts the fun back into gardening. Here, finally, is gardening for the rest of us. Author tour & Web site promotion. 35,000 print.
author: Marty Asher
